properties.name: recaptcha.site-key
properties.description: The key the user use to connect to v3 recaptcha

properties.name: recaptcha.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key the app use to connect to v3 recaptcha

properties.name: recaptcha.verify-url
properties.description: The urls site verifys the captcha

properties.name: recaptcha.score-threshold
properties.description: The threshold that the user has to overcome
